home.tagline:
Unofficial Sniper Elite 4 Interactive Maps
(Currently under development)

controls.resetInvisConfirm: This will reset all invisible/tracked markers to their default state (visible), are you sure?
controls.backupSave:
This will download a backup copy of all sniperelite4maps settings.

The file will be saved as: __fileName__

Are you sure?
controls.backupHtmlFail: Sorry.  Restore is not possible.  This browser does not support HTML5 File APIs.

credits.botHelp: With help from __mcarver__, __designGears__ & other __contributors__. For the full list of Javascript libraries used, __jsCredits__.
credits.botAssets: Sniper Elite logo, icons, map & text are the property of __hm__

misc.contribute: Work in progress! Help appreciated at __link__
misc.helpTranslate: Want to help or improve translations?
misc.portraitWarn: Note: the map is best viewed in landscape mode, tap to dismiss
misc.needhelp: does this item need description? tell me at reddit
misc.mainmission: (marker for authenticy playtrough, since you have nothing on your map)
